sentences.english: The following figure provides an architectural overview of the solution suggested in this article.
sentences.chinese: 下圖提供了本文中所建議的解決方案的一個架構概覽。

sentences.english: their relatively small scale makes it easier, and far faster, for them to adopt green frameworks.
sentences.chinese: 相對較小的規模使生態城採用綠色架構更容易更快速。

sentences.english: This was due mainly to our wanting to use tools that the client's architect was familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 這主要是由於我們想使用客戶的架構師所熟悉的工具。

sentences.english: We design the backbone of the application -- the architecture.
sentences.chinese: 我們設計應用程序的骨架，即架構。

sentences.english: This open architecture design provides extensive flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 這種開發式架構設計提供廣泛的靈活性。

sentences.english: The obvious one is the move towards the architecture that are by and large loosely coupled distributed systems.
sentences.chinese: 最明顯的一個是邁向架構，是對大松耦合分佈式系統。

sentences.english: A given system may exhibit more than one architectural style. As Shaw and Garlan describe it
sentences.chinese: 一個系統可以包含多於一個架構風格。

sentences.english: This does not mean, however, that an idealized layered architecture must be implemented with no compromises.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這並不意味着必須實現理想化的分層架構。

sentences.english: This separation of powers between the Executive and the Legislature is part of the constitution's checks and balances.
sentences.chinese: 這是行政立法兩權分立相互制衡的憲政架構。

sentences.english: Design of a Collaborative Knowledge Management System Framework …
sentences.chinese: 協同式知識管理系統架構之設計。

sentences.english: It can be thought of as an instruction to a policy processing infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 對於策略處理基礎架構來說，可以將其看作一條指令。

sentences.english: Most architects agree that this is essential to the success of the project.
sentences.chinese: 大部分架構師都認爲這對項目的成功極爲重要。

sentences.english: The main research productions are as follows:(1)A component pattern 3-D visualization platform for tourism resources was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 架構了構件式的旅遊資源三維可視化平臺體系結構。

sentences.english: New bit allocation module reduces the two nested loop structure to one single loop .
sentences.chinese: 新的位元分配模組將雙迴圈架構化減爲單一回圈架構。

sentences.english: New bit allocation module reduces the two nested loop structure to one single loop .
sentences.chinese: 新的位元分配模組將雙迴圈架構化減爲單一回圈架構。

sentences.english: Service realization is performed by the software architect and the designer.
sentences.chinese: 服務實現是由軟件架構師和設計師來完成的。
